Html:
Hey there,

seems that the filter has been a bit shaken up between 2.2.18 and 2.2.19. The healadin model now displays once again Horde and Alliance versions of items.

Also, Solace of the Defeated and Solace of the Fallen have their proc missing, been a few versions now.

Cheers!

Solace of the Defeated (and Solace of the Fallen?) have their procc still missing! (v2.2.27)

Item 47041 + 47271: 8x 16 Mana per 5 sec (10 Sec on Healing Cast)

Item 47059 + 47432: 8x 18 Mana per 5 sec (10 Sec on Healing Cast)

Odd - they do have it for me in the latest version. Been in a few revisions, too. I used to edit them manually but now it's no longer necessary. And I don't believe those changes are kept because I have to edit some general settings each time I switch to a newer version.
